name: Change (itch) (CFerry)
description:
Change affects us all and one of the most hard hitting times is having to change where you go to school/college. Joining a new school and not knowing anyone can be hard mentally but i just takes a little bit of initiative to make change into an oppurtunity.

Massive thanks to 6th class in Derryconor National school, Co. Donegal who's work can be seen on show.

-Amy Urquhurt

-Adam Cannon

-Caoimhin Lynch

-Cara Billings

-Ciaran O'Domhnaill

-Daniel Mulhern

-Darren O'Halloran

-Emer Coyle
